title: Charlize Theron posts flashback photo from Oscars 2016 | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The dress hugged her curves through the mid-thigh before sweeping out into a beautiful mermaid cut and a flowing train. She complemented the look with a smoky eye and a chic, side swept hairdo. Hollywood glamour: The dress hugged her curves through the mid-thigh before sweeping out into a beautiful mermaid cut and a flowing train The team responsible for her glamorous look in February 2016 included hair stylist Enzo Angileri, makeup artist Francesca Tolot and wardrobe stylist Leslie Fremar. Though not up for an award this year, Theron has hardware of her own from the 76th Annual Academy Awards in 2004. She won the highly coveted Oscar in the category of Best Actress for her portrayal of sex worker Aileen Wuornos, turned serial killer, in Monster. Up next: Charlize will play Lorraine Broughton in Atomic Blonde and will take on the role of Cipher in The Fate of the Furious alongside Vin Diesel; seen here in a poster for Atomic Blonde Looking ahead for the actor and producer, she'll star in two movies out this year. Theron will play Lorraine Broughton in Atomic Blonde, a mystery thriller about an undercover MI6 agent on assignment in Berlin during the Cold War, and will take on the role of Cipher in The Fate of the Furious alongside Vin Diesel, the eighth installment in the Fast and the Furious series. The Fate of the Furious is out April 14 and Atomic Blonde premieres in July.
